task.summary: Make it work in Idea. Remove dependencies on other modules (mainly remove usage of "dodgy" database helper classes)
Reorganize so that the project will actually create a valid war file.
Work on making the chatterbox work.
Chatterbox works except for the asynchronous messaging (atmosphere)
Update the client to handle xml messages (by treating them as strings mostly). Don't use the automagic serialization.
Make sure that the authentication filter supports asynchronous use.
Return a string not a charsequence.

MESSAGE.value: Make it work in Idea. Remove dependencies on other modules (mainly remove usage of "dodgy" database helper classes)
Make things work with gradle. Fix
Reorganize so that the project will actually create a valid war file.
Work on making the chatterbox work.
Chatterbox works except for the asynchronous messaging (atmosphere)
Update the client to handle xml messages (by treating them as strings mostly). Don't use the automagic serialization.
Make sure that the authentication filter supports asynchronous use.
Return a string not a charsequence.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Return a string not a charsequence.
